content: Tell me about how can I get admission in government school?

To get admission in government schools in Qatar, you can use the New Student Registration Service provided by the Ministry of Education and Higher Education [doc1]. This service is for registering students in government schools for the next academic year. The categories of admission and registration in government schools include Qatari children, children of Qatari women, children of citizens of the countries of the Cooperation Council for the Arab States of the Gulf, non-Qatari children working in ministries, other government agencies, public authorities and institutions, and children of Qatari nationals who work in fraternal private associations and institutions [doc1]. You can access the New Student Registration Service by clicking on the following link: https://eduservices.edu.gov.qa [doc1].
